1.content: You wake up, and as per usual, the world is a giagantic blur as you attempt to wake yourself from the daze that seperates you from reality and dreamworld.......eventually you wake up, but you ask yourself...what day is it?
1.title: Awakening (the start)

11.content:
School, every young persons worst nightmare, but one of the plus sides to being at this certain school is having 5 cute girls to imagine about through out the day, and the best part is, you're really good friends with all of them.

So, what's the time?
11.title: Weekday (school urrrgh)

111.content:
Maths......oh how much you hated it, not so much the subject itself, but the idiotic teacher that lectured it to you, you swore that you could do a better job teaching the class yourself, his name was Mr Landry, he was aragant, sarcastic, and to put a plainly a moron, and to add more fuel to the fire it was a Monday morning so you already felt like falling asleep without him helping, he was in the middle of one of his boring lectures again when a note came sliding across your desk.

But who was it from?
111.title: 9.10 In maths class

choices: Nah swapping notes is fun enough :)
1111.content:
It was from Sarah, a lively, cute and friendly girl, you've been friends with her for quite a while and know her quite well. She had short brown hair, was quite small about 5ft 3, and was the "baby" of your year being the youngest.

You as bored as i am? lol

You laughed to yourself and scribbled back a reply

Oh god yeah, i'm sooo freaking bored.

And passed it back to her

She giggled at your reply and wrote you another note

Want to try and ask to go to the bathroom, i'll ask first then you, it'll be way better than staying here "Listening" to him

What did you reply?
1111.title: Sarah

11111.content:
You looked over at her, she smiled and nodded to you.

"Sir?, could i go to the bathroom please"

He sighed "If you must" he grumbled
Sarah walked casually out of the room and closed the door, she then stopped and waited for you outside the room next to the frosted glass, you waited about a minute or so just to avoid arousing suspision.

"Sir? could i go to the toilet?"
He stammered for a bit and eventually squeezed out "S-See this is what i'm talking about, you're all wasting your time, messing about, taking toilet breaks and such, when you should be here giving me your undivided attention"
"Sir?" Stuart Cain, your average "class clown" stuck up his hand in an attempt to piss off the teacher even more, and to make himself look witty
"What does undivided mean?"
half the class were cackaling like witches when the "Genius" of the class had finished, it was time for another lecture, but by now Landry's attention had gone off me and was now directed at Stuart, so i just walked out and left, the teacher was so idiotic, he probobly wouldn't even notice i was gone.

I opened the door and joined Sarah outside the class.

"Aww man, i'm glad to be out of there, i felt like i was gonna need a shovel and tunnel my way out of there great escape style" you said as you walked down the corridor with her.

"Hehe, i know what you mean" she replied

"So where we gonna go then? somehow i think we have alot longer than a few minutes out of there"

"Hmmmm, i know, we should go to.......
11111.title: Yeah sure :)

12.content:
You remember it's a Saturday, so you don't have any school, which means, you have the whole weekend at your desposel.
You rise from your bed and put on a pair of jeans and a red T-shirt, you then begin to make your way downstairs too make yourself breakfast.

After devouring some cereal, you decide it's time to fuel your "adiction" but who to start with?

choices: Converse trainers, Black jeans, and a MCR (My chemical romance) T-shirt
Black socks, Skinnies, and a plain black T-shirt
121.content:
Your best friend Taylor phones you and asks if you want to go round her place and hang, her parents are out of town, so she is very boared by herself. (you are also on very close terms with her, you also believe she has a foot fetish herself, as two years ago she insisted in playfully biting your foot when you were swimming together)

You decided to go over to her house and "explore" You rung the doorbell casually as you stood waiting for a reply.

She approached the door and greeted you....but what was she wearing?
121.title: Taylor  ( over at her place)

let the oppertunity go (there may be others)
1211.content:
"Hey!" she greeted you with a hug at the door "Come in"
You had been friends with Taylor for about 5 years, so you knew her pretty well.
"Hey" you replied to her, "How you doin?"
"Meh, okay i guess, it's just that Kelso (her dog) has just basicly took me for a walk, instead of the other way around, and my feet are killing me"

This was your chance, you decided. Do I take this oppertunity, or do i let it go?
1211.title: Taylor's feet need attention

choices: Let her mellow and enjoy her foot rub more
12111.content:
"Ummm, i could give your feet a rub if you want" you asked
"really?" Taylor asked
"yeah, i mean if your feet really are that stressed, I would be happy to"

she smiled and gave you a hug, "okie, hehe" she giggled in excitement

You unlaced left converse first and tugged it off, you then started to lightly rub her socked foot she instantly began to sigh and relax.

"Wow, that feels amazing, where'd you learn to do this"

You felt yourself going slightly red at her saying that, but you just shrugged and laughed a bit to move the topic onwards.

You always thought Taylor had really cute feet, and you knew she was extremely ticklish, usually the slightest touch on her virtually anyway, sends her screaming in a fit of girlish giggles.

What do you do?
12111.title: Taylor's Foot rub

choices: Continue tickling her (maybe kick it up a notch)
121111.content:
You look down at her socked feet, and notice her toes twitching infront of you, as if it were inviting you to play with them, you couldn't hold it in any longer, you just had to tickle them, so you wiggled your index finger from the ball of her foot to her toes, which provoked an instant flurish of giggles from Taylor

"hehehehe quit it, you know how ticklish i am" she said lightly proding your chest with her foot

but her laughter is music to your ears, and she is your friend after all, what should you do?
121111.title: Give her a light tickle

choices: Kick it up a notch and pull off one of her socks
1212.content:
"Hey You"

she said smiling at you as she opened the door "Come in"

You smiled at her back and walked in, you followed her to the living room and flopped back on her couch.
"You want something to drink?"
"Yeah, could i get a glass of water" you asked her, she nodded and went to fetch you your drink.

She returned in a couple of minutes with your water, "There you go" she said sweetly to you

You both sat on the couch and started watching tv, she then started to stretch her legs out on top of your's

"You don't mind do you?" she said slightly giggling
"No not at all" you smiled at her

She then began to playfully wiggle her toes up towards your face.

"Hey" you said to her "I wouldn't do that if i were you"

"Oh yeah?" she replied "Why?" she said as she playfully stuck her tounge out at you.

You then grabbed her socked foot and began to wiggle your fingers all over her foot.

"Hehehehe, nooooo, pleeahehehese, stop ahahahahahaha"
"Well i told you, you shouldn't have done that, now you're going to get it"
"Nooooooo ahahahahaha"

She's begining to pant heavily, what do you do?

12121.content: You quickly grabbed her sock and took it off, exposing her extremely ticklish bare foot and you begin spidering your fingers all over her arch and Taylor starts laughing louder "nooohahahahahaha pppllllzzzzzsssttttooooppppp" her feet try to wiggle out of your hands and away from your tickling fingers but you hold on. Then you start tickling right underneath her toes and she goes wild bucking up and down trying to get away, you watch as her toes scrunch up and her foot moves around in your hand then you look at her and see that her face is red and she's starting to lose air so you decide to stop. Taylor breaths in and out heavily for a few minutes then says "plz no more", you look at her and say "sorry I guess I went a little to far, I forgot how ticklish your feet were" she pulls her feet back, takes off her other sock and puts them on the floor and says "well I guess it was a little fun at the beginning but then you did go to far so next time just be more gentle" she smiles at you and you smile back then you both watch some t.v. for a while then Taylor asks you if you could.

122.content:
Grinning evily at that thought of watching Sarah squirming helplessly beneath your probing fingers, you summon your concentration and...Reconfigure yourself. Every one of the trillions of atoms composing your body suddenly lose cohesion, the component gases rapidly wafting away in the breeze. Across town, in an overgrown copse behind Sarah's house, the air wooshes in on itself and compacts, the very molecules roughly reforming into an almost exact likeness of you, though it would take an electron microscope to determine the differences.

         You grab hold of a tree, steadying yourself as your brain and memories reform. That always left you a little nauseous, which, since you're technically inhabiting a new body that happens to be striking similiar to the last one instead of teleporting the original or something crazy like that, might mke sense. Still, it passes quickly, and you make ready to put your other skills accompaning life as a tickle-fiend to use. Looking through a break in the foliage, you can make out Sarah lying on a couch in her living room, reading a book. From a hundred feet away with the sun partially slanting into your eyes, you casually read the small-print footnote at the bottom of the page. You blink, viewing the house in infra-red, then blink again, seeing it in ultra-violet, then in x-ray. Satisfied that the teen-age girl is alone in the building, you dart across the field to the wall facing the back-yard. Not deterred by the surface, barely solid as it is despite appearences, you go through without any noticeable effect, save a slight ripple in the wall behind you. Still wearing the appearence of a handsome, athletic teenage male, you calmy walk up behind the red-head and clamp a hand around her mouth.
Screaming always got on your nerves.

         Vaulting up behind her on the couch, you easily prevent her from turning her head around with your one arm while pinning her arms togethor with your legs. You could easily and painlessly incapacitate her with a tweak to any of a dozen pressure points in arms reach, but you have to admit you soemwhat enjoy the feel of her, soft, beautifully curved body shaking under you as she fought your super-natural strength. You notice she's wearing some casual clothing, as it's not a school day; a sleevless top that shows off a few inches of tanned skin along her belly and that hugged her smooth contours tightly, a pair of low-slung jean short-shorts, and no socks or shoes.

         Seeing all the exposed skin makes you want to shift around and start tickling her on the spot, while the more sensible portion of your rational tells you to save enjoyment for later and move to a more secluded location. After carefully deliberating-with reflexes and a mind like yours, time isn't your enemy, you actually only materialized in the glade 6.83 seconds ago-you decide to
122.title: Well, he didn't say we COULDN'T do this...

1221.content:
You extend your intangible thoughts from your skull, exerting a force on the blood pounding in the multitude of veins up her neck. Her eyes widen in even greater surprise-briefly, as fatigue washes over her. You only telekinetically clot the veins sending oxygen to her brain for a few seconds-you didn't want to put her out for more than a couple of minutes. As she rapidly goes limp beneathe you, you easily pick her up and carry her towards a bedroom-you don't know or have any interest in just whos-down the hall.

         Hefting her onto the four-poster bed, you reach into thin air, and, using the same technique as your seeming 'telleportation', summon a set of silken ropes out of the air. With the speed of long practice at the art, you loosely bind her spread-eagled to the bed. Taking your time, you muffle her soon-to-be laughter with a ball-gag, blindfold her, and begin tieing the toes back - but only on her right foot. Maybe you'll want to start lightly on this victim, instead of employing all your tested techniques?

         To finish up, you force her hands into fists and lightly tie them off that way-maybe she would turn out to be more limber than expected and actualy reach the knots. And if she did somehow get out, what woold she do without the use of any fingers? Satisfied that she won't get out any time soon, you reverse the pressure on the flow of blood to her skull, effectively shortening the brief head-ache and disorientation that accompanied the knock-out process.

Now to get down to business...
1221.title: There's nothing like the hunt-except the catch!

Amy's sides are obviously ticklish, but not very much. You look up the girl's slim torso, looking for a more sensitive spot, until your eyes align on her sleeveless top.          "Perfect", you think, still massaging Amy's ribcage. You can feel her chest moving as she continues to laugh, helpless to resist your tickling.

         "No, please!" Thd girl giggles, squirming underneath you. Despite her protests to your tickling, she seems to be genuinely enjoying it. She giggles every time, her laughter evolving into a squeal of ticklishness every time your hands near her armpits. You smile in delight at Amy's reaction. You feel like you never want to stop tickling this adorable girl. You enjoy the feel of your fingers against Amy's smooth skin. Amy continues to laugh and squirm as you continue the tickling of her underarms. Her struggling was to no avail, she could not stop her pits from being teased and tickled mercilessly. You allow yourself to enjoy four more minutes of Amy's beautiful laughter, then finally slow to a gentle spider tickle in both armpits. info.brief_description: These girls are super ticklish, it's your "mission" to see how much
info.description:
You are Sam, a 17 year old boy who carries a strong foot fetish, your story.....should you choose to accept it, is to explore your fetish and see how far it goes. These girls are not just ticklish, but also contain other "feetures"
Good luck!

and at least 100G's are rewarded for detailed add-ons. :)

Your main characters are:

Taylor 17 - Ticklish everywhere (on feet the most)
Sarah 16 - Ticklish on sides and feet
Natalie 17 - Ticklish everywhere (on sides the most)
Amy 17 - Ticklish EVERYWHERE!!!
Anne Marie 15 - Ticklish almost everywhere (on knees the most)
